cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is a pretty sweet whip. AC, moonroof, all the stuff. Comes with a childseat and a child.
This is a former gypsy cab. Lots of character. It has been auctioned off at least times by the Metro Police Dept.
The car every generation X-er wanted as a kid. Thank you Miami Vice.
We have one of these, but it's not for sale. We're going to light it on fire because that's what they all deserve.
This is a mail truck. Grumman, as in Northrop Grumman, makes them. LLV stands for Long Life Vehicle.
